name: Paddle Bounce 3D
description:
Paddle Bounce 3D is a remake of my first ever game which was a 2D Solo Player Pong!

I decided it would be cool to try and make it without looking back at the tutorial OK, I cheated a bit because I got stuck in a few places , With a twist! I used 3D Graphics for the paddle, ball and any other graphics.

I've also started working on some Power Ups and hope to add a leader board in the future! This will hopefully make the game more playable and provide a cool learning experience on my Game Dev journey!

Controls: 

A or Left Arrow: Move Left
S or Right Arrow: Move Right

Pretty much self explanatory :D 

Enjoy!
